data.lyric:
[ti:Minimum Wage]
[ar:Blake Shelton]
[al:Minimum Wage]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Minimum Wage - Blake Shelton
[00:10.59]Lyrics by：Corey Crowder/Jesse Frasure/Nicolle Galyon
[00:21.19]Yeah I met you 'fore anybody knew my name
[00:24.24]Playin' for pennies on the dive bar stage
[00:26.68]Split an all-star special on our first date in a Waffle House booth
[00:32.09]Your daddy was cryin' when he gave you away
[00:34.54]'Cause all those country songs I played
[00:37.30]They didn't come with a 401k
[00:39.82]But hey I had you
[00:42.32]You can make a six pack on the carpet
[00:44.72]Taste like a million dollar bill
[00:47.37]You can make a one bed room apartment
[00:50.30]Feel like a house up on the hill
[00:52.68]You can make my truck out in the driveway
[00:55.50]Roll like a cleaned up Cadillac
[00:58.59]Girl lookin' at you lookin' at me that way
[01:01.11]Can make a man feel rich on minimum wage
[01:05.23]Girl your love is money your love is money
[01:10.52]Yeah your love can make a man feel rich on minimum wage
[01:15.93]Girl your love is money your love is money
[01:21.27]Yeah your love can make a man feel rich on minimum wage
[01:25.16]You can give me a tab that's always open
[01:28.17]Give me a yacht parked out in the ocean
[01:30.74]But all that keepin' up with the Jones'
[01:33.80]It just ain't my style
[01:36.20]Just give me some lights strung out in the yard
[01:38.91]Give me a lawn chair under the stars
[01:41.43]The top of the world's right where you are
[01:43.98]'Cause every time you smile
[01:46.33]You can make a six pack on the carpet
[01:48.79]Taste like a million dollar bill
[01:51.43]You can make a one bed room apartment
[01:54.16]Feel like a house up on the hill
[01:56.69]You can make my truck out in the driveway
[01:59.53]Roll like a cleaned up Cadillac
[02:02.53]Girl lookin' at you lookin' at me that way
[02:05.19]Can make a man feel rich on minimum wage
[02:09.21]Girl your love is money your love is money
[02:14.60]Yeah your love can make a man feel rich on minimum wage
[02:19.91]Girl your love is money your love is money
[02:25.24]Yeah your love can make a man feel rich on minimum wage
[02:50.15]You can make a six pack on the carpet
[02:52.76]Taste like a million dollar bill
[02:55.36]You can make a one bed room apartment
[02:58.21]Feel like a house up on the hill
[03:00.58]You can make my truck out in the driveway
[03:03.42]Roll like a cleaned up Cadillac
[03:06.54]Girl lookin' at you lookin' at me that way
[03:09.26]Can make a man feel rich on minimum wage
[03:13.17]Girl your love is money your love is money
[03:18.49]Yeah your love can make a man feel rich on minimum wage
[03:23.91]Girl your love is money your love is money
[03:29.35]Yeah your love can make a man feel rich on minimum wage
[03:34.49]Girl your love is money your love is money
[03:40.04]Girl your love can make a man feel rich on minimum wage
data.trans:
[ti:Minimum Wage]
[ar:Blake Shelton]
[al:Minimum Wage]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:10.59]//
[00:21.19]我在名不见经传的时候遇到你
[00:24.24]在廉价酒吧舞台上演出赚小钱
[00:26.68]在松饼屋餐厅分享一份全明星套餐
[00:32.09]把你交给我时 你父亲泪流满面
[00:34.54]因为我唱的这些乡村音乐
[00:37.30]无法给你带来安稳的生活
[00:39.82]但是 我拥有了你
[00:42.32]你可以让在地毯上喝的啤酒
[00:44.72]尝起来也有百万钞票的滋味
[00:47.37]你可以让只有一张床的公寓
[00:50.30]感觉也像山顶豪宅那般舒心
[00:52.68]你可以让我停在门口的卡车
[00:55.50]变得像一辆干净的凯迪拉克
[00:58.59]姑娘 仅仅是看着你和我对视的眼神
[01:01.11]就能让拿着最低工资的我感到无比富有
[01:05.23]姑娘 你的爱就是财富
[01:10.52]你的爱可以让拿着最低工资的我感到无比富有
[01:15.93]姑娘 你的爱就是财富
[01:21.27]你的爱可以让拿着最低工资的我感到无比富有
[01:25.16]你可以给我永远喝不完的美酒
[01:28.17]给我一艘停在大海中的游艇
[01:30.74]但那些物质上的攀比
[01:33.80]真的不是我的风格
[01:36.20]只需要在我的小院里挂几盏灯
[01:38.91]让我在星空下有一把草坪躺椅
[01:41.43]有你在的地方 就是世界之巅
[01:43.98]因为每当你微笑时
[01:46.33]你可以让在地毯上喝的啤酒
[01:48.79]尝起来也有百万钞票的滋味
[01:51.43]你可以让只有一张床的公寓
[01:54.16]感觉也像山顶豪宅那般舒心
[01:56.69]你可以让我停在门口的卡车
[01:59.53]变得像一辆干净的凯迪拉克
[02:02.53]姑娘 仅仅是看着你和我对视的眼神
[02:05.19]就能让拿着最低工资的我感到无比富有
[02:09.21]姑娘 你的爱就是财富
